onboarding.message: To be able to redeem your voucher, you have to onboard fully first. Please follow the steps below.

form.subheader: Easily buy crypto vouchers, customize and send them as gift cards.
form.howToSetupYotiButton: How to set up your Yoti
form.userNeedVerificationMessage: Your account is in verification process. After we approve, you will get an email and then can start using Vouchers app. Thank you for your patience!
form.maxVoucherValueValidationMessage: You are allowed {{currencySymbol}}{{limit}} of active vouchers at any time. You have {{currencySymbol}}{{remaining}} remaining
form.tosCheckboxLabel: I have read and accept the <L1>Terms of Service</L1>.
form.truthfulInfoCheckboxLabel: I confirm that all information I provide is truthful and complete, and that <L>I am not a US person or hold identity from other countries not serviced.<L>
form.privacyConsentCheckboxLabel: I understand and accept the <L>Privacy Policy</L> and I consent to the collection, storage, and processing of my personal information accordingly.

vouchersList.redeemRequiresOnboardingMessage: Voucher redemption requires connecting an ethereum address and verifying your email. Confirm to continue.
vouchersList.confirmRedeemMessage: Click okay to request redemption of this voucher. We will email you when the funds have been deposited in your connected ethereum address.

payment.subheader: Complete payment to create your voucher. The crypto corresponding with this voucher will be held by Swarm Markets until redeemed.
